Cf: ''[[Knowing the pathophysiology of haemorrhoids 2C-288-EP-B01|2C-288-EP-B01]]''''

question.title: Knowing the main factors favouring haemorrhoidal pathology
question.description: Which of the following factors does not favour the development of haemorrhoidal pathology?

option_a.title: High fibre diet
option_a.description: A high fibre diet can reduce the risk of haemorrhoidal pathology

option_b.title: Standing for long periods
option_b.description: Standing for long periods can favour the development of haemorrhoidal pathology

option_c.title: Low physical activity
option_c.description: Low physical activity can favour the development of haemorrhoidal pathology

option_d.title: Good circulation
option_d.description: Good circulation can favour the development of haemorrhoidal pathology
